name: keyboard-emulator
description: Web keyboard for different types of inputs
author: Master Kai <eugene1kliuiev@gmail.com>

scripts.build:light: rm -f dist/* && webpack --env COLORSCHEME=light --config webpack.config.js --mode production
scripts.build:dark: rm -f dist/* && webpack --env COLORSCHEME=dark --config webpack.config.js --mode production
